p: Due to descanting effects of Dorema, it was described as a purgation agent to clean the brain from phlegm and other humors [ 52]. Taking a combination of Dorema with honey or beer is a useful remedy for epilepsy and insensibility (numbness) spasms [ 52, 57]. Also gurgling a warm watery solution of the plant is suitable for cleaning the brain from waste phlegm and humors, dizziness, paralysis, facial paralysis and vertigo [ 52].
